text:
Some time ago, a website talked about the dangers of public check-ins. This means telling everyone where you are online. The website said that when you say, "Hey, I’m at this place," you are also showing your location to many people, not all of whom you might want to see. This shows that sharing everything online can have bad sides. 
The internet gives us many chances to share our lives with many people. We can share our stories, photos, and feelings. But sometimes, we can get lost in this sharing. It can feel overwhelming. 
In the early days of the internet, some people, called bloggers, explored these dangers. They shared their lives online and faced many problems. They lost jobs and friends, and they learned about the risks of being famous online. One of these early bloggers was Justin Hall. In January 1994, he started sharing his life on the web. At that time, the internet was mostly for students and scientists. Hall wanted to share his personal stories. 
In 1996, he began writing a daily blog. Many people read it because he was open about everything in his life. But one day, his homepage disappeared and was replaced by a sad video called Dark Night. He had fallen in love, but when he wrote about it, his partner said he had to choose between the blog and the relationship. Hall felt that sharing his life online made people not trust him. 
In 2002, another blogger named Heather Armstrong wrote about her job on her blog called Dooce. One day, a coworker sent her blog link to the bosses at her company, and she lost her job. This shows that what we say online can have real-life consequences. 
Armstrong’s story had a happy ending. After some time, she got married and started blogging again, focusing on her family. Now, she is a well-known "mommy blogger," and her writing helps support her family. 
What we can learn from these stories is that while the internet lets us say anything, we should think carefully before we share.

A while ago, some scientists started to warn people about a low-budget film called What the Bleep Do We Know? This film mixes documentary and drama to show that there is a lot we do not understand about our universe. Scientists can be a bit proud, but even the most confident ones do not say they know everything about the universe. Some scientists felt they needed to warn people about the film, calling it “atrocious” and “very dangerous.” This made me curious to see the movie.
At first, I did not understand why the film was so important. Some scientists talked about new discoveries that show the universe is stranger than we thought. But when the film talked about these discoveries, I started to see why it was interesting. One claim was that water molecules can be changed by our thoughts. I had heard before that a Japanese researcher showed how the shape of water molecules could change based on people’s thoughts. The movie showed pictures of ice crystals that looked beautiful when someone was happy and ugly when someone was in a bad mood. Many people find this kind of evidence convincing, but scientists often say, “Give me a break.” 
The idea that water can be affected by thoughts is amazing, but we need good proof that it is true. Pretty pictures of crystals are not enough. The movie’s claims were not strange enough. For example, scientists say that water molecules have energy that comes from nowhere and is linked to a force that is making the universe expand. This evidence comes from many years of research in labs and observatories around the world.
There are real discoveries that show the universe is stranger than we thought. Astronomers found that the universe is made of an unknown type of matter and is pushed by a mysterious force called “dark energy.” Other discoveries are also surprising. Neuroscientists found that our brains take about half a second to understand what is happening around us. Anthropologists believe they have found where modern humans began and how they spread around the world. Some scientists think there are connections between life on Earth and the design of the universe.
Science is not finished. In fact, we are learning that many natural events are more complicated than we thought. New ideas about chaos and uncertainty show that there are limits to what we can know. Some of the best physicists are trying to create a “Theory of Everything” that explains all the forces and particles in the universe with one equation. Many of us believe that the universe can be described in one word: incredible.

Writing novels is hard for me, but writing short stories is fun. Writing a novel is like planting a big forest, while writing a short story is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. The trees in the forest give shade, and the wind makes the leaves move. In the garden, flowers bloom and attract bees and butterflies, showing the change of seasons.
Since I started writing, I have often switched between novels and short stories. After I finish a novel, I want to write short stories. After I finish some short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories while writing a novel, and I never write a novel while working on short stories. They use different parts of my brain, and it takes time to change from one to the other.
I began my writing career with two short novels in 1975. From 1984 to 1985, I started writing short stories. I didn’t know much about writing short stories then, so it was hard, but it was a great experience. I felt my imagination grow, and readers liked this new side of me. One of my first short stories, “Breaking Waves,” was in my first collection called Tales from Abroad. This was how I started writing short stories.
One great thing about short stories is that they don’t take long to finish. Usually, it takes me about a week to write a short story, but I can change it many times. Writing a novel takes a year or two, and it can feel very long. Sometimes, I wonder if I will finish. So, writing short stories is a nice change for me. 
Another good thing about short stories is that you can create a story from small ideas, like a thought or an image. It feels like jazz music, where the story goes where it wants. Also, with short stories, you don’t have to worry about failing. If an idea doesn’t work, you can just move on. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver didn’t write perfect stories every time. This makes me feel better. I can learn from my mistakes and use that in my next story.
When I write novels, I try to learn from what works and what doesn’t in my short stories. Short stories help me experiment with ideas. It is harder to try new things in a novel, so without short stories, writing novels would be even more difficult for me. My short stories are like soft shadows I have left in the world. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. Short stories show my feelings, and I am happy to share them with my readers.

Science is a way to understand the world. It can help us find cures for diseases and make our lives easier. However, it can also create problems. Science tries to explain everything, from tiny atoms to the vast universe. It has influenced many people, including poets and politicians. Sometimes, people do not understand science well, and its importance can be seen in different ways.
Science is always changing. New ideas can replace old ones, and this can cause arguments among scientists. This book will talk about important ideas in science and how they have changed our thinking. We will look at the beauty of these ideas and also remember that science has limits. 
Throughout history, scientists have made many discoveries. For example, in the 1600s, Isaac Newton explained how the universe works better than earlier thinkers like Aristotle. Later, Albert Einstein built on Newton's ideas. Science can make mistakes, but it keeps moving forward. 
In the late 1800s, many scientists thought there was not much left to discover. But then, new ideas like radioactivity and quantum mechanics changed everything. Today, some people believe we are close to finding a complete explanation of the universe.
Science is important for everyone. It affects our lives and the future of our planet. We cannot ignore scientific progress because it will shape the world our children will live in. Understanding science is necessary for making good choices about our future.

From around 2015, many big book publishers noticed that sales of ebooks were not growing anymore. In some cases, sales even went down. This made people question if ebooks would be important in the future. One publishing executive said that the excitement about ebooks might have led to bad investments, and his company lost trust in printed books. 
Even though it seems that ebooks and printed books can exist together, people still ask if ebooks will replace printed books. This question is interesting and makes people talk a lot. Why do we think of ebooks and printed books as being in competition? The answers to these questions tell us more about how we feel about new technology and change.
In my research, I found that people often think one type of media will replace another when new technology comes out. For example, when television was invented, many people thought radio would disappear. But radio found new ways to be used, like in cars and factories. The idea that books might disappear is not new either. In 1894, some people thought that phonographs would replace books with audiobooks.
Many times, people have said that new things like movies, radio, and smartphones would end printed books. Some believed this would hurt culture, while others thought ebooks would be much better. The idea that books might disappear often comes up when new technology is introduced. This shows our mixed feelings about change.
We form strong emotional connections with different types of media, like books and computers. Studies show that we can even name our cars or get upset when our laptops don’t work. When new technology, like e-readers, comes out, it changes our relationship with things we love. As technology changes, we often miss what we used to have.
This is why people still enjoy older products and technologies. For example, when the printing press was invented in the 15th century, people wanted to find original manuscripts. When movies changed from silent to sound in the 1920s, people felt nostalgic for silent films. The same thing happened when photography changed from film to digital and from vinyl records to CDs. 
E-readers have made people appreciate the feel and smell of printed books more. This should make those who worry about printed books disappearing feel better. However, the idea of books disappearing will continue to be a popular story about how technology changes our lives and how we feel about that change. 
We often use familiar stories, like those about loss, to understand change. The story of books disappearing is easy to remember and share. It reflects our excitement for the future and our fear of losing things we love, including parts of ourselves.

For a year and a half, I woke up every weekday at 5:30 in the morning. I brushed my teeth, made coffee, and wrote about how great thinkers from the last four hundred years did their best work. I wanted to show how they found time each day to be creative and productive. By writing about their daily lives – when they slept, ate, worked, and worried – I hoped to give a new view of their personalities and careers. 
A French writer, Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin, once said, “Tell me what you eat, and I shall tell you what you are.” I say, “Tell me what time you eat, and if you take a nap afterward.” This book is not deep; it is about how creative people work, not what they create. But it is also personal. The writer John Cheever said that you show something about yourself even when you write a business letter. 
I have questions that I think about in my own life: How can you do meaningful creative work and also earn money? Is it better to focus on one project or to work a little each day? When there is not enough time, do you have to give up things like sleep or a clean house, or can you learn to do more in less time? I do not have all the answers, but I have examples of how many successful people faced similar challenges. 
The title of the book is Daily Rituals, but I really wrote about people’s routines. A routine can seem boring, but it can also help you use your time, willpower, and optimism better. A good routine helps you focus and keeps your mood steady. The psychologist William James said that having good habits can help us focus on more interesting things. Ironically, he was a procrastinator and could not keep a regular schedule.
This book started because of my own procrastination. One Sunday, I was at my job at a small architecture magazine, trying to write a story due the next day. Instead of working, I was cleaning my desk and making coffee. I am a morning person and can focus well in the morning, but I struggle in the afternoon. To feel better about this, I started looking online for information about other writers’ schedules. I found many interesting stories and thought someone should collect them. That is how I started the Daily Routines blog and later this book.
The blog was simple; I shared people’s routines from biographies and articles. For the book, I gathered more information and made it better researched. I let the people I wrote about share their own words from letters and interviews. In some cases, I summarized their routines from other sources. I want to thank the many biographers, journalists, and scholars whose work helped me. I have listed all my sources in the Notes section for further reading.

Howard wanted to be a palaeontologist when he was six years old. This happened after his father said they could not go on holiday to Spain because of money problems. Instead, they went to a beach in England. One day, Howard found an ammonite, which is a type of fossil, on the beach. He had always wanted to study fossils and, by the end of university, he knew he wanted to study the very old ones, not dinosaurs.
After finishing his studies, Howard worried about finding a job. He felt good about his skills, but he knew that sometimes good people do not get good jobs. When a job opened at Tavistock College in London, he applied, but he did not expect much.
On the day of his interview, the professor who was supposed to help with the interview had a fight with his wife. He was upset and crashed his car, so he could not come to the interview. Another professor, who did not like the first one, took his place. This professor helped Howard get the job, even though Howard did not know him well. Howard was happy to get the job, but later he learned that it was not just because of his skills.
Howard was glad to have the job and to do the work he loved. He often thought about how his work life was organized, while his personal life was sometimes chaotic. One day, someone stole his briefcase with his lecture notes while he was at a train station. He was very angry and went back to the college. He called to explain and postponed his lecture. 
After reporting the theft, he went for coffee and met a colleague who was with a visitor from the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard learned about a new collection of fossils that needed to be studied. This could be a great opportunity for him. Because of the theft, he changed his plans. He decided not to go to a conference in Stockholm or take students to Scotland. Instead, he would find a way to visit the museum in Nairobi.

Charles Spence eats many different foods. He even has ice cream made from bee larvae at home. It may look strange, but it tastes a little like nuts and flowers. Spence is a Professor of Experimental Psychology at Oxford University in the UK. He studies how our senses work together to help us taste food. He wants to make eating bugs more acceptable. 
Spence's research affects what we eat and drink. He works with big food companies and famous restaurants. He studies many things that can change how we taste food, like who we eat with, how food is presented, and even the noise around us. His book, The Perfect Meal, has interesting facts about food. For example, the first person to order in a restaurant usually enjoys their meal the most. Also, we eat more food when we are with other people.
Spence's lab in Oxford is simple. He uses basic tools and old equipment. This helps him work with chefs who do not have much money for research. Many of his projects are funded by a big food company. In the past, some people thought research funded by companies was not real science. But now, it is important for universities to show that their work matters to people.
Spence helps food companies reduce salt and sugar in their products. This is good for customers because it helps them stay healthy. Many companies make these changes slowly so that customers do not notice. Spence found that when people know about these changes, they may not like the food as much.
Spence met famous chef Heston Blumenthal while working on a project. They worked together to create a dish called "Sound of the Sea." Spence studies how sounds can change the taste of food. For example, high music can make food taste sweeter, while low music can make it taste bitter. Soon, an airline will match music with the food they serve.
Spence has fun at home too. He has had dinner parties where they eat rabbit with fur on the cutlery and play with colorful lights. He even had a party with different drinks and headphones to see how sounds change the taste. For Spence, home and food events are just like his lab.

Our brains are very busy today. We get a lot of information, some of it true and some not. We have to figure out what is important and what we can ignore. In the past, travel agents helped us book flights, and salespeople helped us find things in stores. Now, we do most of these things ourselves. We are trying to do many tasks at once while also managing our lives, families, jobs, hobbies, and favorite TV shows. Our smartphones help us with this, but they also make us feel like we need to do everything quickly.
However, thinking we can do many things at once is a big mistake. Earl Miller, a scientist at MIT, says our brains are not good at multitasking. When we try to do many things at the same time, we are really just switching quickly from one task to another. This can make us less efficient. Multitasking can also increase stress in our bodies, making it hard to think clearly.
Our brains can easily get distracted by new things. This means that the part of our brain we need to focus is often pulled away by other things. Just having the chance to multitask can hurt our ability to think well. Glenn Wilson, a psychology professor, found that trying to focus on a task while seeing an unread email can lower our IQ by almost 10 points. This is worse than being tired.
Russ Poldrack, another scientist, found that if students do homework while watching TV, they remember the information in the wrong way. Without distractions, they can remember it better. Multitasking also means we have to make many small decisions, like whether to answer a text or not. Making many small decisions can tire our brains and lead to bad choices about important things.
Many people, including business leaders and scientists, say that email is a big problem. It is not that email is bad, but the huge amount of messages we get is overwhelming. A 10-year-old boy once said his father, a neuroscientist, just answers emails. His father agreed that this is often true. We feel we must reply to emails, but it is hard to do that and get other things done.

In a zoo in Sweden, a chimpanzee named Santino broke concrete at night to throw at visitors during the day. Was he being mean? In caves in the US, female bats help other fruit bat mothers if they cannot give birth properly. Are they being kind? Fifty years ago, people did not think much about these questions. Animals acted in certain ways, and scientists studied those actions. They did not believe that animals had feelings or thoughts like humans. But now, this idea is changing. Research on bats, chimps, rats, dolphins, and chickens shows that animals have emotions. This new understanding is starting to appear in popular science books, like Mark Bekoff’s "Wild Justice" and Victoria Braithwaite’s "Do Fish Feel Pain?". 
This change has started a big question: do animals have consciousness? This leads to another question about conscience, which is a person’s sense of right and wrong. In a recent study with cows, those that opened a locked gate for food seemed happier than those that had help. If cows enjoy solving problems, what does this mean for how we raise and eat cows? While people agree on what they see, they do not agree on what it means. Dr. Jonathan Balcombe, who wrote "Second Nature," believes we should stop eating meat. He thinks we are close to a big change in how we think about ethics, like when slavery ended. Aubrey Manning, a professor, believes we should rethink how we see animal thinking. He says animals might have a simpler way of thinking than humans. Professor Euan MacPhail thinks we should not put human feelings on animals. 
These experts may never agree because the main issue is not just science or morals, but philosophy. It is hard to define consciousness, so can we really know what it is like to be a bat? Balcombe talks about an important study he did that suggests starlings, a type of bird, can feel sad. In a study at Newcastle University, starlings were kept in two different types of cages. One group had big, nice cages, and the other had small, empty cages. At first, both groups learned to eat tasty worms from one box and avoid bad worms from another. But when only bad worms were offered, only the starlings in nice cages would eat. Balcombe thinks that being in a bad cage made the starlings feel negative about life. 
Balcombe, who supports animal rights, believes that in the future, people will look back and feel bad about how we treated animals, just like we feel bad about racism. He says we cannot support animal rights while eating meat. If he were the only one with this view, it might be easy to ignore him. But Professor Aubrey Manning agrees with him. Manning has written a book about animal behavior. He says we are changing our views again. In the past, some people thought animals thought like us, but now we are starting to think differently. However, this is a complicated topic, and it is important to listen carefully to different opinions.

Critical thinking is a way to understand better what we read or hear. Adrian West, a research director, says that arguing can help us find the truth. Technology helps us store and process information, but it can also change how we think about complex problems. West points out that we see a lot of poor thinking and opinions that can confuse us. More information does not always mean better knowledge or decisions. 
According to the National Endowment for the Arts, fewer people are reading books, and this is happening faster now. Patricia Greenfield, a psychology professor, believes that focusing more on visual media, like videos, can hurt our critical thinking. People are multitasking and not focusing on one thing. 
We do not yet know exactly how technology affects critical thinking. Technology has changed how we think, and it can be both good and bad. For example, some video games can help us think critically, while reading online can improve our analysis skills, but clicking on many links can make it hard to think deeply. 
Greenfield says that reading helps our imagination and critical thinking, while visual media like video games and TV do not. However, she also found that visual media can help with some types of information processing. Unfortunately, most visual media do not give us time to think or reflect. This can lead to many young people not reaching their full potential.
How society views technology affects how we think critically. James Paul Gee, a professor, says that video games are often seen as bad for kids, but they can actually be good for learning. Some games, like Sim City and Civilization, teach decision-making and analytical skills in a fun way. These games allow players to explore ideas that they might not be able to in real life. 
In our digital age, as reading and math scores go down, we need to understand better how technology affects our thinking and analysis.

Matthew Crawford is a motorcycle mechanic. He chose this job because he was unhappy with working in an office and social policy jobs. His first book talked about the good things about manual work. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. He got the idea for this book while shopping. He saw ads on the credit card machine while he was entering his pin number. Crawford realized that it is hard to avoid these ads that take our attention. 
He believes that what we think about is personal, but we often cannot choose this because of things we do not notice. It is getting harder to think or remember conversations. People try to avoid being interrupted, so they stop talking to strangers. Crawford says we see the world through things like video games and apps, which can control our desires. 
Many people feel overwhelmed by emails at work and still check emails in their free time. Studies show that just seeing a phone can make it hard to focus. We have worried about this since the telegraph was invented in 1837. We are more aware of other things we could be doing. Crawford thinks technology makes us more self-focused. 
With so many choices, it is hard to control ourselves, which affects our social lives. People prefer to text friends instead of talking to them. By only interacting with screens, we might lose important connections with others. For example, in his gym, people used to listen to one music player together, which created a social atmosphere. Now, everyone listens to their own music with earbuds, and the gym feels less social.
Crawford has two ideas to help. First, we need to reduce noise and distractions in public places. Second, he believes we should practice skills that help us connect with the real world. He mentions cooks, ice-hockey players, and motorcycle racers as examples of people who deal with real things. They use their judgment and work with others around them. 
Crawford says that when we engage with the real world, we see that fake experiences are not as good. This does not mean everyone should become a chef, but it is important to use our judgment. There are many benefits to this, like feeling satisfied with our work. Constantly fighting distractions can be tiring and make it hard to focus on what is important. Focusing on one thing can help us pay attention to other things better.

"What do you do for a living?" This is a common question we ask to get to know someone. Most people answer this question with a few words about their job. But if you are a philosopher, like me, it can be a bit more complicated. Saying "I am a philosopher" can sound a bit showy. It feels better to say that I study or teach philosophy. Many people think philosophers know special truths, but that is not true. Philosophers are just like everyone else.
One reason people think this way is that philosophers often judge what others do and talk about thinking deeply. A famous Greek philosopher named Aristotle believed that thinking about life is very important. He thought it was the best way to live. Today, not all philosophers agree with him, but people still connect philosophy with deep thinking.
Another Greek philosopher, Socrates, said that "the unexamined life is not worth living." This means that just going along with what everyone else thinks is not enough. We need to think about our lives to make good choices. However, you do not need to read many difficult books or spend all your time thinking to examine your life. It just means paying attention to your daily experiences and making sure they are meaningful.
Philosophy should help us understand our lives better. But sometimes, academic philosophy feels far away from real life. This is partly because philosophers often write for other experts and not for everyone. Because of this, many people think philosophy is not relevant to them. 
I sometimes call myself an "ethicist" because I study ethics, which is about what is right and wrong. Recently, I feel this title does not fully describe my work. Ethics is often seen as related to rules and laws. But there is more to it. Ethics also looks at whether certain actions are fair or unfair in society. 
For example, we might discuss if downloading movies illegally is wrong (it is) and then talk about our ideas about responsibility and art. Philosophy helps us think more about the actions and beliefs that shape our lives. Sometimes we find out we already know the answers; other times, we realize our beliefs need more thought. By examining these ideas, we can all benefit.

People who love food, like foodies and chefs, often think about how what we eat can make us happy. But, in the past, when philosophers talked about food, they usually used it to explain other ideas, like learning. Sometimes, discussions about food seem to be about food, but they are really about other topics.
One famous philosopher, Epicurus, believed in seeking pleasure and avoiding pain in many parts of life. Today, his name is often connected to enjoying food and drink. Many restaurants and food shops use his name because they think it will attract customers. Food is not just about eating; it is also about sharing with others and our culture. The food we eat comes from history and is shared with people in our communities. These communities help us grow and share food.
Food is special because we interact with it more than with other things. After food is cooked, critics write and talk about it. Some people wonder why food critics are important. One philosopher said that tasting food is not a special skill; critics are just better at describing what food tastes like. Most studies about our senses focus on sight, but taste should also be studied more.
Another interesting part of food is its beauty. We often say paintings or music are beautiful, but we don’t usually say that about food. Some philosophers think that, because of modern cooking, food should be considered beautiful like art. However, food is eaten and gone, while art stays. So, it is not right to think of food as art.
There are also many important questions about food. For example, what should we eat? Should we choose organic, free-range, or vegetarian foods? Our choices show our beliefs. Philosophers like to ask why we make these choices, and this is a good topic for discussion.
Cooking at home is different from cooking in restaurants. Home cooks have a special duty to their friends and family. When we cook at home, everyone shares food and time together. But restaurant cooks have to follow rules for their job, and they work with colleagues, not friends.
A recent essay called "Diplomacy of the Dish" talks about how food can help people from different cultures connect. We can learn to enjoy other people's food and build friendships by eating together. The essay includes many interesting stories that make this idea about food philosophy come alive for everyone.

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He creates special board games called ‘legacy’ games. When he was a child, he played traditional board games, but he thought they were not fun or challenging anymore. He wanted to make board games better. He asked himself if board games could have stories and if choices made in one game could affect the next game. 
He took a classic game called Risk and made a new version called Risk Legacy. In this game, choices made by players during the game have lasting effects. Players might have to tear up cards, change the game board, or open new packets with different rules. The game is played over several sessions, and players can remember past actions. Daviau said, “You could point to the board and say: ‘Right here! You did this!’”
Later, he worked on a legacy version of another popular game called Pandemic, where players work together to cure diseases. His next game was SeaFall. Pandemic Legacy was very popular, but SeaFall was seen as a big test because it was a new game, not based on an old one. In SeaFall, players are sailors exploring a new world in the 16th to 19th centuries. 
Designers of legacy games must think about all the choices players can make to keep the story interesting. They use play-testers to see how the game works. Jaime Barriga was a play-tester for SeaFall. He said it takes a lot of time to test the game. Sometimes the game works well at first, but later it can have problems, and they need to fix it.
At first, Daviau did not think legacy games would be very popular. He thought only a few people would like them. But many players, like Russell Chapman, really enjoyed the idea. He said it was a big improvement in game design. “It’s a new level of commitment and excitement,” he said. Another fan, Ben Hogg, said that even though players might worry about changing the game, they loved the adventure. He compared it to watching a new movie instead of the same one again.
Legacy games are inspired by video games and popular TV shows. Daviau wanted to be a TV writer when he was in college, but he ended up in advertising and then game design. He still loves telling stories. Matt Leacock, the creator of Pandemic, said making a legacy game is like writing a book. You need to know how it starts and how it will end, but you also need to plan the details.
Daviau is happy with his work but is curious to see how others will use the idea. He thinks players will soon want something new. Colby Dauch, who works for the company that published SeaFall, believes the legacy format has changed how people think about board games.

One night not long ago, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at New Zealand’s National Aquarium. He crawled across the floor and squeezed into a small drain that led to the Pacific Ocean. This story was exciting and many people shared it online. 
People enjoy stories like this because they like to think that animals are like us. Octopuses are very smart and can do many amazing things. They can open jars, recognize faces, use coconut shells for protection, and even play games. 
Dr. Frans de Waal studies animals like gorillas and chimpanzees. He believes that we often do not see how smart animals really are. He says that animals can think about the past and future, feel empathy, and understand what others want. This means animals are smarter than we usually think.
In the past, people believed that animals were smart. In medieval Europe, animals could even be put on trial for crimes. Charles Darwin, who changed how we see our place in the world, said that the difference between human and animal minds is not so big. 
In the twentieth century, many people thought animals were just machines that reacted to rewards and punishments. This idea made people forget that animals have feelings and thoughts. During this time, humans also harmed animal habitats and did not care for animals' well-being.
Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals are intelligent in their own ways. He says that we are learning more about animal intelligence every day. For example, squirrels may not do well on human memory tests, but they can remember where they hide their nuts.
In her book, The Soul of an Octopus, naturalist Sy Montgomery says that if an octopus tested human intelligence, it might look at how well we can change the colors of our skin. If we could not do this, the octopus might think we are not very smart.
Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really knew how to escape to the ocean. But he understands that stories like Inky’s help people appreciate how smart animals can be. He once did an experiment with capuchin monkeys to see if they could feel envy. When some monkeys got cucumbers and others got grapes, the ones with cucumbers got very upset. This study was published in a scientific journal, but a video of the experiment made people really believe the findings. 
This shows how interesting and complex animal minds can be.

Robots are becoming very important in our world. They are not just in stories anymore; they are changing how we work. For many years, robots have helped in factories and making cars. Now, experts say that robots will be used in many more areas soon, but many people are not ready for this change.
Many people think that robots will do most of the work that humans do in the next 50 years. However, most of them also believe that their jobs will stay the same. This is not true. Robots will affect all kinds of jobs in the next few years. For example, an Australian company called Fastbrick Robotics has made a robot named Hadrian X. This robot can lay 1,000 bricks in one hour. It would take two human workers a whole day to do the same job.
Another example is a robot called Tally, made by a company in San Francisco. Tally walks around supermarkets to check if the shelves are full and the prices are correct. It does not clean the aisles, as some might think.
Some people say that robots cannot fix or program themselves yet. This means there will be new jobs for people who can work with robots. But others worry that we need to keep the human touch in our jobs. Dr. Jing Bing Zhang, an expert in robotics, studies how robots will change work in the future. He says that in two years, many robots will be smarter and able to work with each other and with humans.
In three years, many big companies will have a special person in charge of robots. In five years, salaries in the robotics field will go up a lot, but there will still be many jobs that cannot be filled because there are not enough skilled workers.
Dr. Zhang believes that people with lower skills will be affected the most by robots. He says they need to learn new skills instead of waiting for the government to protect their jobs. 
New technologies will create new types of robots that we have never seen before. These robots will live with us in our homes and interact with us. This is a big chance for companies, but it also brings challenges, like making sure we are safe and our privacy is protected.
With many jobs at risk, it is important to focus on education. Countries need more graduates in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) to stay competitive in the future.

George Mallory, a famous mountaineer, once answered a reporter's question about why he wanted to climb Mount Everest by saying, "Because it’s there." This answer shows that many people wonder why someone would take such a dangerous risk. Some climbers might feel inspired by this answer to follow their dreams. Climbing can be about adventure and having fun.
In 1967, a Bolivian writer named Tejada-Flores wrote an important essay called "Games that Climbers Play." He talked about seven different climbing activities, from playing on small rocks to climbing high mountains. Each activity has its own rules, and the way climbers choose to climb depends on these rules. This idea has become popular in climbing discussions in the West, appearing in magazines and conversations.
Many climbers love climbing because it makes them feel free. However, climbing can also be very limiting. For example, being stuck in a tent during a storm is not what most people think of as freedom. This shows a contradiction in climbing. But some people believe that having fewer choices can make life simpler and give a different kind of freedom.
When asked, "Why climb?" US rock climber Joe Fitschen suggests asking, "Why do people climb?" He believes climbing is part of being human. We like to take on challenges and test our limits, even if it is risky. The joy of climbing is connected to our nature.
Another important idea comes from US academic Brian Treanor. He says that climbing can help us develop good qualities like courage, humility, and respect for nature. While not all climbers show these qualities, Treanor thinks they are important in today’s world.
Some believe that climbers who do not depend on others or technology must be very dedicated to succeed. Expert climbers Ebert and Robinson stirred some debate by saying that climbing alone is harder and deserves more recognition than climbing with a team or using tools like bottled oxygen. However, this idea might encourage some climbers to take unnecessary risks.
Climbing can also be understood outside of Western ideas. Many climbers talk about being in the moment or going with the flow. The physical effort, focus, and problem-solving in climbing are similar to techniques in Zen philosophy, which helps people find peace. This gives us another reason to think about why people are attracted to climbing.

Alfred Brendel was a famous pianist for over sixty years. He was known for playing important European piano music. He wrote and played a lot, but he did not teach many students. People who knew him saw that he could be playful, but he was usually serious in his concerts. He spent his time studying, traveling, and performing.
About four or five years ago, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of Brendel’s concerts and asked him for lessons. At first, Brendel did not think much of it. He had very few students and did not want to start teaching now. He remembered a saying from another pianist: “You don’t ask a mountain guide to teach a child how to walk.” But when he heard Kit play, he was impressed. Kit was about 14 years old and played very well from memory. He even gave Brendel a CD of his performance, which was beautiful. Brendel thought, “I need to make time for him.” 
As Brendel steps back from performing, Kit is starting to become more known. Kit is now 19 years old and is always busy. He learns new languages, studies math, writes computer code, and plays tennis, all while his mother watches over him. He also composes music. Brendel believes that writing music helps Kit learn to read it better. He noticed that Kit has an amazing memory and can read music very well. Kit listens carefully to his own playing and understands Brendel’s instructions.
Brendel is careful not to raise expectations for Kit. He gets upset when newspapers call Kit the next great pianist of the 21st century. He thinks this can be harmful. Young musicians can play some things very well, but they still need time to improve in other areas. 
Now at 80 years old, Brendel is more relaxed in his life after performing. He says that when he was young, he did not want to be famous quickly. He wanted to achieve certain goals by the time he was 50. When he reached 50, he felt he had done most of those things but still wanted to do more. Even though he cannot play as much now, he still has many ideas in his mind and enjoys his new life.

When I was a child, I thought gardens were beautiful places. My grandad’s garden was by a river and sloped down to the water. You couldn’t touch the river, but you could hear the water and the birds in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this – peaceful and nice. 
Grandad’s garden was simple. He didn’t have a fancy greenhouse like some neighbors. Their greenhouses were made from old window frames with plastic covering broken glass. At home, my dad was quiet. He liked to say funny phrases, like “It’s immaterial to me,” instead of just saying “I don’t mind.” He didn’t finish school and became a plumber, which he didn’t love. He wasn’t very ambitious, but he was good at fixing things around the house. 
My parents only moved once in their life, but my mom liked to change the furniture a lot. Just when you got used to one chair, a new one would appear. The biggest change was when a piano came into the house. I wanted to like it, but it scared me. I liked the brass candlesticks on it, but my mom said they were too fancy and they disappeared while I was at school. I never got to play the piano, but my sister took lessons. When I asked my mom why I couldn’t play, she said, “You’d never have practiced.”
I loved the river more than the moors or woods. I could imagine a different world there. I would take a fishing net and wear old sandals with the front cut out for my toes. I walked along the riverbank looking for a good spot to take off my sandals and have a picnic. I tried to catch fish, but they didn’t survive in my backyard, so I put them back in the water.
I wanted to leave school quickly, but it seemed hard until one day my dad said, “There’s a job for an apprentice gardener in the Parks Department. I thought you might like it.” In that moment, he surprised me. He might have preferred if I became a carpenter, but I think he hoped I would do well in gardening. Even though he didn’t like gardening, I believe he saw my love for it and wanted me to succeed.

Lawrence MacEwen is on his Scottish island, the Isle of Muck. I am with him. A strong wind is blowing, and it feels like we might be blown off the cliff and into the ocean below. But Lawrence’s sheepdog, Tie, comes close, and Lawrence pets him gently. The wind is loud, but Lawrence is happy on his island.
Lawrence shows me around. He points to the north and shouts, “That island is Eigg. The one next to it is the Isle of Rum. It gets more rain than we do.” I see dark clouds raining on Rum’s big mountains. “Beyond Rum is the island of Soay.” 
Suddenly, Lawrence says, “I have sheep to move.” We walk down the hill. He tells me about the island: Muck is three kilometers long and one and a half kilometers wide. The geese here eat a lot of grass. The MacEwen family has lived on this island for 3000 years. 
While herding the sheep, Tie is not doing a good job. Lawrence says, “Away to me, Tie,” which means the dog should go to the right. But Tie goes straight through the sheep, causing confusion. Lawrence sounds disappointed. “That will never do.” Tie looks sorry.
The Isle of Muck is mostly run by the MacEwen family. Lawrence and his wife, Jenny, run the farm. Their son Colin takes care of the island cottages, and their daughter Mary runs the island hotel, Port Mor, with her husband, Toby. Mary and Toby like that their two boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer. “They go out and come back when they are hungry,” Mary says.
But life on the island has some problems. For example, electricity is not always available. On my first night, I wait for the lights to turn on. The next morning, I see Mary making breakfast with a flashlight. I also have no mobile phone service. Mary tells me, “You can get a signal on the hill, but most people just put their phones away after a couple of days.” So I do the same.
Life on Muck is surprising. A boat brings groceries and three musicians today. They come off the boat with their instruments. Their concert in the tearoom is very popular, and the islanders enjoy the music.
That night, while it rains outside, Lawrence tells me how he met Jenny. “Her father bought a small farm on the Isle of Soay without even seeing it. He had never been to Scotland. Jenny went to manage it.” I ask if Jenny knew how to run a farm. “She had good typing skills,” Lawrence replies.
I go to bed with the sound of rain and wake up to more rain. But I eat well because most of the food comes from the island. Mary sends me to fisherman Sandy Mathers for fresh fish. I carry it back to Mary’s kitchen. By 7 pm, our fish is on the table, and it is very delicious.
The next morning, I worry about my ferry ride to the next island. Many ferries have been canceled because of high waves. If my ferry does not come, I will be stuck on Muck for two more days. Part of me secretly hopes that happens, phone or no phone.

The game design industry used to be mostly for computer scientists and self-taught people. Many thought video games were just a hobby for young people. But now, the video game industry is taken seriously. It is not easy to get into this field. Making video games based on new movies needs many team members and a lot of skill and hard work. 
Jim Donelly, who works for an online games magazine, says it is hard to get a job in big companies. But the industry needs game designers now more than ever. They need not just the top people who manage the whole game, but also those who design parts of the game. 
So, how can you start a career in this competitive industry? Many companies want people with a degree in computer science, but Jim thinks differently. He says, "The best way is to make games. You need to show what you can do. If you don’t make anything, you won’t get a job." Game design is not just a job; it is a way of life. 
Another expert, John Field, agrees but adds that it is more complicated. Many people want to work in games, but few have the skills needed today. It is important to have creativity, technical skills, and the ability to think of new ideas. 
Can you work alone? John says, "Maybe, but it is hard." A good course in game design can help you learn and get support. Most game designers start as programmers or artists and then move up in their careers. They love all kinds of entertainment and are interested in art and culture. They may have worked for a few years after school but know that games are what they want to do. 
Connections are also important. To succeed in games, like in many jobs, you need to meet people. 
The idea that only young boys play video games is changing. Now, many adults play games too. Families often play together on game consoles. Smartphones also have many new games through apps and social media. John believes there is a lot of room for growth in this area. "Games are popular with many people. They are also a fun way to learn, and I see many new opportunities in this field."

Since I was a child, I have always wanted to play football. My dad encouraged me to play, and I am thankful for that. I had a friend whose dad was very strict. He always said, "You can’t do this, you can’t do that." My friend could have been a good player, but he stopped wanting to play football. I am happy that I still love the game. 
When I score a great goal from far away, some people say it is just luck, but it is not. I have practiced shooting from a distance since I was young. You need to practice to score amazing goals. The best players in the world have natural talent, but they also practice a lot. 
Sometimes, I see young players bumping into each other, but I learned the right way to play. When I teach kids, I always tell them to enjoy learning new skills. At school, I played many sports like rounders, baseball, athletics, and basketball. I know now that a good education is important, but back then, I only thought about football. The teachers were good, but I didn’t notice it at the time. I want my son to have a different experience. We are already trying to read him books, even though he is too young to sit still. I hope he does not just want to kick the books around like I did.
At the start of my professional football career, the manager helped younger players like me to play for the first team. He never made a big deal about it, but we all knew we had to do our best. I scored in my first game, but we lost. A famous TV presenter said, "You can’t win anything with kids." This made us realize we had to work hard. We had some doubts, but we believed in ourselves as a team.
I depend a lot on my close friends and family. Having money can sometimes cause problems. People ask me why my mother still works. I help my parents with money. I paid off their house loan and bought them a car for Christmas. My family is strong, and they do not want to just take money from me. My mom loves her job as a hairdresser, even if she does not earn much. I enjoy using my money to help my family.
I have money, but not as much as people think. Money does not solve all my problems. After I stop playing football, I want to take a year off to do things I have not done for a long time. I want to go skiing the day after I stop playing. I cannot do that now because if I break a leg while skiing, I would not be able to play football again, and I would not be insured.

It was because of Sam Carter that we lived at Reef Point. Sam was my father’s agent in Los Angeles. He helped us find a cheap place to live because my father could not write anything while we were in Los Angeles. Sam was worried about losing his clients and money.
During the summer, the beach was empty because the sun was often covered by sea fog. Reef Point did not have many visitors. The road to get there was not nice, and a better place called La Carmella was nearby. Most people went there instead. Only those who had no money or loved surfing came to Reef Point. But now, with the hot weather, many people were at the beach. After being alone for months, we were now surrounded by people and activities.
My father was busy every day trying to write a script. He was very stressed. I often went to the beach with a book and my dog, Rusty. When we first moved to Reef Point, we did not have a dog, but Rusty came to us. I tried to send him away, but he always came back. One morning, I felt sorry for him and gave him some water. My father threw a boot at him, but he did not really want to hurt him. Rusty knew this and came closer. I asked my father, “Who does he belong to?” My father said, “You are wrong, Jane. He thinks we belong to him.”
Rusty loved the beach. He liked to dig and bring things to me. Sometimes he found things that were not his, like a new sneaker or a beach towel. I had to give those back to their owners. Rusty also liked to swim and always wanted to swim with me, even though I could swim faster. He never got tired of it.
That day, we had been swimming. My father went to Los Angeles to deliver his script. Rusty and I played in the sea all afternoon. As the sun began to set, it got cooler, and we watched the surfers. They had been surfing all day and did not seem to get tired. One surfer caught my eye. She was very good and made the others look clumsy. When she finished, she came over to us.
“Hi,” she said. “Why didn’t you join us?” 
“I don’t have a surfboard.”
“You could get one.”
“I have no money.”
“You’re British, right? Are you visiting?”
“No, I live here.”
“Is your father American?”
“No. He came here to write a film script from a novel he wrote.”
“Really? What’s his name?”
“Rufus Marsh.”
“Do you mean, Tall as the Morning?” 
I nodded. 
“I read that book!” She looked at me with interest. I thought this was how it always was. People were friendly but only showed interest when I mentioned Tall as the Morning.

Violet Hetherington was confused. She stood in a long line at the dock in Southampton, waiting to board the Queen Caroline. The line was very long, and no one was moving. Her friend Annie had told her, “It’s better to arrive late. If you come too early, you will just wait.” Annie was married to a diplomat and traveled a lot, so she knew what she was talking about. But this time, Annie was wrong.
After some time, an announcement came over the loudspeakers. They said there was a problem with the computer system. The people waiting became unhappy. Some tried to be patient, and a few even tried to be cheerful, but most were angry. They had paid a lot of money for this trip, and they wanted to enjoy it. Violet felt like leaving. 
She checked her bag for her phone but could not find it. This made her more upset than the long wait. She thought that maybe taking a cruise was a bad idea. Now, without her phone, she could not call the taxi company to see if she left it in the taxi. All her important numbers were in her phone. Her son Harry always told her to be careful about this.
In line behind her, there was a nice couple. Violet asked them, “I’m sorry, but I think I left my phone behind. Can I use yours to make a call?” She called Harry and left a message. She asked him to ask their neighbor, Kristina, to check if her phone was at home. If it was not there, she would be in trouble because she needed her phone to find numbers in New York. Part of her felt relieved, but she did not tell Harry that. Harry thought he was wiser than his mother. Daniel, her younger son, was more understanding of her mistakes, but he might forget to give the message to Kristina.
Finally, the line started to move. Violet went to a window, gave her travel documents, and got ready to board the ship. When she entered the ship, she felt disappointed. The inside looked like a fancy hotel that was not very nice. There were shiny fake wood panels, big chandeliers, and carpets that looked like those in airports.
Violet followed the signs to the elevators. The elevators were full of tired passengers who did not want to see their reflections in the mirrors. She was squeezed against the wall as the elevator went up, stopping at each floor to let people out. Finally, on the twelfth floor, she stepped out and felt free. 
She was happy to see that her room had the balcony she wanted. She had worried about what to say if it did not. Ignoring Annie’s advice to wait for a better deal, she had decided to pay more money to make sure she had a nice view of the sea.

When John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction, he did not know he was starting to discover the mystery of Vivian Maier. Maloof wanted pictures for a book about Portage Park, a neighborhood in Chicago, USA. Instead, he found 30,000 photos taken by Maier, a street photographer who had a special talent for taking interesting pictures. Since then, Maloof has collected many things about Maier’s life and work. In his home attic, he keeps her cameras, 2,000 rolls of film, 3,000 prints, and 100,000 negatives, along with many 8mm movies and audiotapes.
One morning, Maloof looked around at all the items. He felt he was close to something amazing, and it happened by chance. “When I bought this, I had no idea what it was,” Maloof said. “I could have easily sold it all to someone else.” For a while, Maloof and his friend Anthony Rydzon have been learning about Maier’s life. They talked to families who hired her as a nanny and to people at the shop where she developed her film.
Maier was born in 1926 in New York and spent much of her childhood in France. In 1951, she returned to New York and in 1956 moved to Chicago to work as a nanny. Maier was a private person and always carried a camera. She wore big coats, wide-brimmed hats, and sturdy shoes. “On her day off, she would have her camera around her neck and we wouldn’t see her until late at night,” said Maren Baylaender, whose husband hired Maier to care for his daughter. “She was private but had strong opinions about movies and politics.”
Maier knew a lot about theater and movies. Even though she was not very social, she walked the streets with her camera and talked to people, some of whom she interviewed on audiotape. She seemed to be very dedicated to her “second job” of documenting the world around her. “She was a true artist and followed her dreams,” said Rydzon. “She didn’t let anything stop her.”
Maier’s work is pure art; she did not create it for money. Her photos often show women, children, the elderly, the poor, and abstract scenes. “What is interesting about Vivian is that she has many fascinating pictures,” said photography expert Larry Silverman. He sees influences from other photographers in her work and wonders if she developed her own style. “Was Vivian very skilled, or did she take ideas from others?” Maloof often thinks about whether he will ever go through all the negatives, which he keeps in three tall, fireproof cabinets. 
The funny thing is that he was not really interested in photography until he found Maier’s work. Inspired by her photos, Maloof started taking his own pictures. “As I learned more about photography and looked at her work again, I realized that the people and street scenes were what mattered to her,” he said. “There was much more to her work than I thought, and I realized I had something very important. Now our goal is to share her name and get Vivian Maier into the history books.”

When a book is called ambitious, it often means it did not succeed as expected. But this is not true for Eleanor Catton’s book, The Luminaries. I spoke with her in the UK when her book was very popular. She was calm, even though she was still in her twenties. She had just come from Germany and was going back to New Zealand the next day. 
Eleanor told me a story about being stopped at passport control. The officer asked her to prove she was a writer. She showed her book to the officer, who then asked, “What is it about?” This is not an easy question for a writer. 
The Luminaries takes place in New Zealand during the 1860s. There are many crimes, and twelve men come together to solve them. The story is very complex. Eleanor wanted to write a murder mystery, not a historical book, but she found that the past gave her many ideas for her characters. The book is over 800 pages long because she wanted to give each of the 20 main characters a good story.
When I asked her how it feels to be so successful at a young age, she said it feels nice to come from a small country. She feels that everyone at home shares in her success. She also mentioned that it can be annoying when people think her book is not serious.
Eleanor wanted to write the book in a spiral shape. Each part is half the length of the part before it, making the story speed up. I asked if it matters if readers notice this. She said she wanted to create patterns in the book that readers could see if they wanted to, but it was not necessary.
Even with its unique structure, The Luminaries is still an exciting murder mystery. Surprisingly, Eleanor did not know how the story would end when she started writing. She would write herself into difficult situations and then find creative ways to get out of them. She also wanted to make the book fun for readers.
We talked about her love for TV dramas, which have cliff-hangers and different points of view. I asked if she would like to write for TV. She said that could be interesting. 
Eleanor is very passionate when she talks about her writing and New Zealand. She notices how her ideas change when she is in different places. She understands why writers leave New Zealand for bigger cities with more people. But for now, New Zealand will still be her home. I hope it gives her the inspiration for many more novels.

Jonny Kinkead is a man who loves guitars. When he was a boy, he liked to make things in his dad’s garage and play the guitar. For the last forty years, he has built acoustic guitars by hand. Jonny is amazed that two pieces of wood can make beautiful music. He learned to play his brother’s guitar when he was eleven years old. At sixteen, he wanted to learn the bass guitar. Instead of saving money for one, he decided to make it himself. He studied how different shapes and types of wood change the sound of the guitar.
Before making the bass guitar, Jonny and his brothers built model boats and planes. Their father taught them how to use tools. Jonny also fixed guitars for his friends. His first bass guitar turned out well, but he did not think about making guitars as a job at that time. He was also interested in painting and sculpture. After finishing school, he went to university to study architecture because he liked design. But halfway through, he left because he wanted to do something different. He realized that making guitars is like making art, but it is also useful because people can play them.
For ten years, Jonny made guitars and cleaned windows to earn extra money. At first, he sold his guitars for the cost of materials. As he became known as a good guitar maker, he could charge more money. Even now, after almost forty years, he says he is still just getting by. He can only make about ten guitars a year, which limits his income. In the beginning, he worked hard to get people to know him. He went to music festivals and let musicians try his guitars.
Jonny thinks it is easier for new guitar makers today. When he started, many people believed that only guitars made in the USA were good. But now, UK-made guitars are respected. He believes that new guitar makers should take classes to learn important skills. However, he also thinks that learning by trying and making mistakes is very important. Jonny says it is good to look at other instruments and see what works and what doesn’t. If you make the back of the guitar too thin or too thick, it will not sound good. He believes that if you learn from someone else, you may only learn one way, but if you teach yourself, you can learn many things.

When people talk about English conversation, they often start with the weather. A famous writer from the 1700s, Dr. Johnson, said, “When two Englishmen meet, their first talk is of the weather.” This is still true today. Many people try to explain why the English talk about the weather so much, but they often get it wrong. They think that English people talk about the weather because they really care about it. 
For example, the American writer Bill Bryson says that English weather is not very interesting. He points out that in England, there are no big storms like tornadoes or blizzards. However, the English broadcaster Jeremy Paxman disagrees. He believes that English weather is interesting because it is always changing. He says that even if the weather is not extreme, it is still important to talk about because it is never the same.
I think both Bryson and Paxman miss the real reason why English people talk about the weather. Our conversations about the weather are not really about the weather. They are a way for English people to start talking to each other. For example, when someone says, “Nice day, isn’t it?” or “Ooh, isn’t it cold?” they are not really asking about the weather. These phrases are just ways to greet someone or to keep a conversation going.
There are specific times when people use weather talk. Some people say that English people talk about the weather all the time, but that is not true. There are three main situations for weather talk: as a greeting, to start a conversation, or to fill a pause when there is silence. This is why it seems like English people talk about the weather a lot. A conversation might start with a weather greeting, then move to other topics, and go back to the weather when there is a pause. This is why many people think that English people are obsessed with the weather.

Alice Leader was standing in front of Hadrian’s Wall in Britain. She was trying to explain to her class of 12- and 13-year-olds how amazing it was that the Romans built something 120 km long and 5 meters high about 1900 years ago. The students were interested in this trip instead of going to Spain, Greece, or France. But they wanted to know why the wall was built, and Alice felt her answers were not good enough. 
Alice could not find a good historical novel about life at the Wall during Roman times, so she decided to write one herself. After teaching for 31 years, she started a new career as a writer in 2001. She felt nervous but excited about this big change. Alice said, “Teaching is like acting. It is very demanding. Writing is exciting, but it is not so tiring. My old teaching friends are jealous because I still connect with children through my stories.”
Alice wants her books to fill a gap in children’s fiction. She noticed that many books for teenagers talk about negative experiences or are total fantasy, like Harry Potter. Her books are different. Alice always taught English and History together, using stories like the Tale of Troy to make lessons interesting. She loves to see when a child goes from being bored to being interested. “I enjoy having bored children because it is a challenge for me to make them interested,” she said.
Alice started writing her first novel because she saw a need for it. She was also inspired by her head teacher, who suggested she take a creative writing course. At first, Alice did not want to spend her summer on a course. But she had to send a story to the tutors before she could join. She quickly wrote a story about a Roman couple and their baby. After three hours and 30 pages, she sent it in and got accepted.
During the course, other students read her story and gave her good feedback. They encouraged her to publish it. With only her report cards as proof of her writing skills, she asked her head teacher for a year off to write her first novel. Alice’s husband, Zachary Leader, helped her by editing her work. She said, “My mother-in-law thinks we are rival authors, but I believe we help each other. He changes the sentences and suggests better words, while I like to add more scenes.”

To raise money for charity, a newspaper and a TV company asked brothers Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, who are champion triathletes, to join a special race. This race would have Jonny in a car and Alistair on a mountain bike. They would race in the beautiful and hilly Yorkshire Dales in northern England. 
Jonny was excited. He said, “I’ve never done anything like this before! These roads have beautiful views, and it’s very cold, so I can stay warm in the car.” Alistair was also eager, but he wore warm cycling clothes. He joked, “I’ve seen Jonny drive before, so I’m not sure he will make it. I might stop for a cup of tea!”
The race started at Semerwater lake and would finish at Fleet Moss, which is the highest road in Yorkshire, about 350 meters up. Jonny had an easy drive, but Alistair had to climb a steep hill right away. They quickly shook hands and then started the race. Alistair rode fast on his bike, while Jonny got in his car and drove off. 
Just 15 seconds into the drive, Jonny faced a problem. A big tractor was in the road. He complained to the cameraman, “If Alistair beats me, it’s all because of this farmer!” After getting past the tractor, Jonny continued driving. Meanwhile, Alistair was having a hard time. He had to get off his bike and carry it up the hill, while sheep watched him. 
Finally, Alistair reached the top of the hill. The sun came out, and he started to ride faster. In the car, Jonny had to deal with narrow roads in the villages. He drove slowly and even went through a small stream on the road. After leaving the last village, he raced straight to the finish line. 
Neither brother knew how close they were to each other. Jonny drove fast to Fleet Moss, while Alistair rode quickly across his last field and back to the road. He pushed hard and then stopped suddenly at the finish line. He looked up and asked the crowd, “Is he here?” When they said no, he raised his arms and shouted, “Yes!”
A few minutes later, Jonny arrived in his car. He got out and said, “Well done,” but he looked disappointed. “I’m gutted.”

When you play on Centre Court at Wimbledon, it is very quiet. You bounce the ball on the soft grass; you toss it up to serve; you hit it and hear the sound of your shot. The quietness helps me focus on the game. I try to forget everything else and just think about the match. When a point ends, the silence breaks with applause and cheers. I hear the crowd, but it feels far away. I do not think about the fifteen thousand people watching me. I am focused on playing Roger Federer in the 2008 Wimbledon final, which is the biggest match of my life.
I always wanted to play at Wimbledon. My uncle Toni, who is my coach, told me it is the most important tournament. When I was 14, I dreamed of playing there and winning. Before 2008, I played Federer twice and lost both times. In 2006, I was happy just to be there, even though I lost. But in 2007, I was very sad because I knew I could have played better. I cried for half an hour after that match. Losing hurts, especially when you have a chance to win.
Toni usually does not comfort me, but after my loss in 2007, he told me not to cry and that I would have more chances to play at Wimbledon. I felt like it was my last chance to win. I know that a professional athlete's career is short, and I want to make the most of it. I let an important moment slip away in 2007. 
But Toni was right. I had another chance in 2008, just one year later. I felt confident that I had learned from my past loss. The night before the final, I had dinner with my family and friends, but we did not talk about the match. I wanted to focus and prepare in my mind. From that moment until the match started, I wanted to keep my thoughts to myself.

In early April 1957, a young Englishwoman named Jane Goodall arrived in Africa. In her first letter home, she wrote, "I am living in the Africa I have always wanted." She spent most of her life in Africa and became known as a citizen, journalist, scientist, activist, and environmentalist. 
In 1963, Jane became famous when Britain’s National Geographical Society made articles and TV shows about her research on chimpanzees. She also wrote popular books, including children's books and the bestseller "In the Shadow of Man," which has been translated into 47 languages and is still available today. Jane Goodall is one of the most famous female scientists of the 20th century. 
Many stories have been told about her life, but they often focus on her adventures and not her real achievements. Jane Goodall should be recognized for her important work in understanding chimpanzees. She showed us that chimpanzees have emotions like humans and live in social groups similar to ours. Before her research, people did not know that chimpanzees ate meat or used tools. 
Her book, "The Chimpanzees of Gombe," published in 1986, is a key work in chimpanzee research. Jane Goodall studied wild chimpanzees in Gombe State, Nigeria, for many years. Her work changed how we study animals and how we think about ourselves as humans. 
Even as a child, Jane showed signs of becoming a biologist. When she was five years old, she disappeared one day. Her family and the police searched for her. After a long search, she came back with straw in her hair and clothes. When her mother asked where she had been, Jane explained that she wanted to know how hens lay eggs. To find out, she hid in a henhouse for five hours until she saw a hen lay an egg. This curious nature was the start of her journey as a scientist.

Shirley Ford is a voice actor. In our first talk, she shows me many funny voices. She can sound like a cheeky 8-year-old boy, a tired mother, an old Scottish woman, and even a fast-talking alien. People who watch children’s TV and cartoons know her voices well. Shirley tells me she just did a voiceover about back injuries and had to learn many medical words quickly.
Shirley explains that doing voiceovers is not just about funny voices. You need to make the script exciting for people who cannot see you. Many famous actors want to do voiceovers, but they often do not get the jobs because they are used to acting with their whole bodies.
After school, Shirley took a drama course. She wanted to be a regular actor. Sometimes, she sang jingles for TV ads. One day, the man at the recording studio asked her to try out for a rabbit in a cartoon. She thought it was silly but tried it for fun and got the part! This made her realize she could do voices well and that voiceover work could be her path.
In her second film, she played the main character and also her brother and mother. Many adult women voice small boys and girls because their voices are higher. It is complicated to hire child actors, so companies often prefer adult women.
Shirley learned to make different sounds and collects new voices by watching children’s TV. She enjoys working on cartoons the most, but she also does educational videos and ads. Sometimes, it is hard to sound excited about things she does not care about, but she learned to smile while talking to make her voice sound happy.
The competition for voiceover work is tough, and having a good showreel, which shows what you can do, is very important. Shirley says it is worth making a strong showreel and that there are agencies to help with this. She believes she has succeeded because she works hard and does not give up.
For people who want to be voice actors, Shirley suggests going to special workshops that teach about voiceovers. She loves voices and often becomes the characters she plays. Sometimes, after doing a specific voice, she talks like that for hours or even days. Her children are used to her speaking in different voices.

People often ask me how I became a cartoonist. This is normal because many kids dream of being cartoonists, just like they dream of being race car drivers. But most people stop dreaming and choose more practical jobs, like being a tax lawyer or making car parts. It seems silly to think you can make a living by drawing simple pictures, but some people do it.
Not everyone becomes a cartoonist in the same way, but most have wanted to be one for a long time. I had a typical childhood for a cartoonist. I loved comic strips, drew for school papers, and was known as "the kid who draws." I studied graphic design in college. After I graduated, I showed my drawings to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted political cartoons about local issues. I created some ideas, and they bought them. Soon, I was making enough money to live on.
You don’t need much to be a cartoonist. You don’t need a university degree, a lot of money, or even great drawing skills. You just need your brain, your hand, and something to draw with. But if it were that easy, there would be many more cartoonists than teachers. Being a cartoonist is not easy. It’s better to choose a regular job that pays well and gives you time for family and hobbies.
The more skills you have, the better chance you have to make a living with your art. I have done political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also written, made caricatures, and done some design work. I take any job because you can learn a lot, even from work you don’t like. It helps to be smart, read a lot, and be curious about the world.
What about the business side of being a cartoonist? In the past, many cartoonists could find regular jobs with different newspapers and magazines. But now, most cartoonists have to sell their own work. The better you are at selling, the more successful you will be. I have seen cartoonists who are not very creative but are good at business do much better than those who are very talented but don’t know how to sell their work.
Many people worry about someone stealing their ideas, but they have never sold a cartoon. Some are so scared that they won’t even let others see their work! To protect your work, you just need to draw a small ‘c’ for ‘copyright,’ put a circle around it, and write your name and the date next to it. But honestly, it’s more likely that no one will care about your work. If someone does take your cartoon and it becomes popular online, it’s not a disaster – it could be a lucky break!

Twenty years ago, I was moving to a new house and cleaning out my things. I decided to throw away an electric guitar that my dad had given me for my 16th birthday. It was a nice black guitar from Japan. I usually don’t like to throw things away, so I was surprised that I wanted to get rid of it. I took it to the dump and was about to put it in the trash when a young man came up to me. He looked confused and asked, “You’re not going to throw that away, are you?” I told him I was, and I started to feel sad. He asked if he could have it, and I said “Yes.” After that, I felt very sad about giving it away.
